remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件尝试进行切换之间编辑、 insert 和只读模式，但在实际更改模式之前。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 此选项，可以提供一个事件处理方法，执行自定义的例程，例如配置控制为特定模式或取消模式更改中，每次此事件发生时。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定向其模式控件正在转换，以确定是否因为用户取消编辑或插入引发事件操作，或可以指示是否应取消模式更改。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the control is changing, to determine whether the event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation, or to indicate that the mode change should be canceled. 若要确定新的模式，请使用属性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 你还可以使用属性以编程方式指定要通过将其设置为之一更改到的备用模式枚举值。You can also use the property to programmatically specify an alternate mode to which to change by setting it to one of the enumeration values. 使用属性，以确定是否已由用户取消了编辑因此引发此事件或插入操作。Use the property to determine whether this event was raised as the result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation. 若要取消模式更改，将设置属性`true`。To cancel the mode change, set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象传递到事件处理方法事件以隐藏页导航行时控件转换到编辑模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to hide the pager row when the control transitions to edit mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件尝试进行切换之间编辑、 insert 和只读模式，但在实际更改模式之前。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 使用属性来确定是否由于用户取消编辑或插入操作而引发事件。Use the property to determine whether the event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation. 例如，你可能想要重置控制每当用户取消编辑操作。For example, you might want to reset the control whenever the user cancels an edit operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否模式更改为由用户取消编辑操作的结果。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a mode change is the result of the user canceling an edit operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
